referenceObject.reference: Galán-Sánchez, M. A. & Álvarez-Padilla, F. (2022). A new genus of caponiid spiders with its phylogenetic placement within Nopinae and the description of a new species of Orthonops Chamberlin, 1924 from eastern Mexico (Araneae: Synspermiata, Caponiidae).
